flawed_nl_solution:
Since she buys one rug at $40 and sells it at $60, she makes a profit of $60-$40 = $<<60-40=10>>10
If she bought 20 rugs at $40 and sold them at $60 each, she made a profit of 20*$10 = $200
#### 200

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 20, not 10. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
